monster.name: Dairy Sprite Familiar
languages: understands the languages of its summoner but can’t speak

trait.name: Airy Cream
entries: The sprite automatically succeeds on saving throws against being knocked prone.

trait.name: Familiar Bond
entries: The sprite can serve another creature as a familiar, obeying its commands and sharing its senses, as described in the {@spell find familiar} spell.

action.name: Creamy Prod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h damage} {@damage 1d4 + 2} force.

spell.name: Creamy Cloud
entries: You create a billowing 20-foot-radius cloud of whipped cream centred on a point you can see within range. The cloud spreads around corners and is heavily obscured.
• Difficult Terrain. Creatures treat the area as difficult terrain.
• Blinding Sweetness. A creature that starts its turn in the cloud must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of its turn.
• Sugary Succour. The first time each round an ally enters the cloud, it gains {@damage 1d4} temporary hit points.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 3rd level or higher, increase the radius by 5 ft and the temporary hit points by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Dairy Familiar
entries: You gain the service of a {@creature Dairy Sprite Familiar|CMC_HB}, which appears in an unoccupied space within 10 ft. It functions exactly as a familiar summoned by {@spell find familiar}, except it has the statistics of the Dairy Sprite Familiar provided in this compendium.
If the familiar drops to 0 hit points, it melts into a puddle of sweet cream. You can use this spell to call it forth again.

entries.name: Hot Cocoa Delivery
entries: When you cast a spell with a range of touch, your familiar can deliver the spell as normal. In addition, once per long rest it can share a sip of cocoa, allowing the recipient to regain {@damage 1d6} hit points.

spell.name: Cozy Fondue Retreat
entries: A 10-foot-radius, 5-foot-high dome of gently bubbling fondue appears, centred on a point you choose. The dome blocks line of sight and provides half cover to those inside.

• Healing Dip. A creature inside can use its action (bonus action if it begins its turn inside) to eat, regaining {@damage 1d6} hit points. Each creature can benefit a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus.
• Fondue Fling. When a hostile creature hits the dome with a melee attack, hot cheese splatters: the attacker must succeed on a Dexterity save or take {@damage 1d4} fire damage.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When cast with a slot of 3rd level or higher, increase the healing by {@dice 1d6} per slot and the dome’s height by 5 ft per slot.

spell.name: Chocolate Catapult

components.m: a fist-sized chunk of hardened chocolate

entries: Choose one object weighing 1 to 5 pounds within range that isn’t being worn or carried. The object flies in a straight line up to 90 feet and stops early if it impacts a solid surface or creature.

If the object hits a creature, that creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save the target takes {@damage 3d8} bludgeoning damage; on a success the object sails past and lands harmlessly, dealing no damage.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Porter’s Patch
entries: Your carrier (porter) and you are surrounded by a 10-foot-radius patch of miraculously firm chocolate. The ground within is not difficult terrain for the porter or for you, but it is difficult terrain for all other creatures.
While within the patch, the porter gains a +10-foot bonus to speed and has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove or grapple.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius increases by 5 ft per slot level above 2nd.
